text: Those who trust in the Lord are like Mount Zion, for it is unshakeable and endures forever.
In the same way that the mountains surround Jerusalem, the Lord surrounds his people, now and forever.
The wicked will not always rule
Lord, please do good to those who do good, those who sincerely do what is right.
But as for those who turn aside to follow their own crooked waysâ€”the Lord will lead them away together with those who do evil.
